```{r}
x <- log(Animals$body)
y <- log(Animals$brain)
plot(x,y)
```

```{r}
sa <- Animals[order(Animals$body), ] #sort by body weight
tail(sa, n=4)
nodino <- sa[-(28:26),]
nodino[22:25,]
```

```{r}
plot(x,y, xlab = "log(body)", ylab = "log(brain)")
b1 <- sum((x-mean(x))*(y-mean(y)))/sum((x-mean(x))^2)
b0 <- mean(y) - b1*mean(x)
estimates <- c(b0,b1)
estimates
```

```{r}
moddino <- lm(y~x)
moddino
plot(x,y, xlab = "log(body)", ylab = "log(brain)")
abline(moddino, col = "pink", lwd = 2)

y2 <- log(nodino$brain)
x2 <- log(nodino$body)

modnodino <- lm(y2~x2)
abline(modnodino, col = "blue", lwd = 2, lty = 2)
leglabels <- c("OLS with Dinosaurs", "OLS without Dinosaurs")
leglty <- c(1,2)
legcol = c("pink", "blue")
legend("topleft", legend = leglabels, lty = leglty, col = legcol, lwd = 2)
```
